p: GBS sequencing reads are available at the NCBI Sequence Read Archive (SRA) ( http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra) under BioProject PRJNA413429. Growth experiment data and scripts for genomic and phenotypic analyses are available at https://github.com/LaMariposa/emelliodora ( Supple, 2018; copy archived at https://github.com/elifesciences-publications/emelliodora).
